tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_classroom_resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(255),
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    resource_description TEXT,
    resource_link VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE reference_materials (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  author VARCHAR(100),
  upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE external_links (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  link_title VARCHAR(255),
  link_url VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE resources (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  linked_material_id INT,
  linked_link_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE resource_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    link_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES virtual_classroom_resource(resource_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES reference_material(material_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (link_id) REFERENCES external_link(link_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES resource_category(category_id)
);
